title: Samson's Lovely Mortal
description: Vampire bachelor Samson can't get it up anymore, and not even his shrink can help him. All that changes when the lovely mortal auditor Delilah tumbles right into his arms. Suddenly there's nothing wrong with his hydraulics ... However, trying to hide the fact he's a vampire is suddenly not his only problem, because when compromising documents are found in Delilah's possession, Samson wonders whether she's the one who has more to hide than he does.  Warning: explicit sex scenes  Wordcount: approx. 90,050
author: Tina Folsom
